title: Ashlii
author: Ashlii
content: Hello again, thank you for reacting to the message I left, maybe the pressure of hardships and life was so much that I only asked for your help to escape from it, friends who attacked me with a harsh tone, you are right. I'm a fool for making such a big request from people who don't know me, my friend, I hope everyone here will one day be rich enough to stop judging others, most of you don't even have half of my bitcoin because you don't have the mentality, but friends who They answered me respectfully, I apologize, it's true that everyone has problems, but I'm drowning and trying to breathe, I'm not a beggar, I work hard, but you're right, this is not a charity.It doesn't matter if I am active in the forum or not, but one day I will come back with a new topic about humanity, then I will help the real needy people as much as I can. Nothing and no one is higher than God

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Like most people pointed out in your previous thread, it’s very strange for a newbie account to just come to the forum and fees minutes later create such type of thread. It’s wasn’t a matter of how much they have or how many bitcoin they owe it was a matter of past experience a lot of users have been here for a long time and they have seen users come and go with this exact type of thread, some might even sound more convincing than the one you created and because of that the moment they saw your thread the referred to it as bs, I’m not sure if I responded to your previous thread but if I were to reply my comment would have revealed that I didn’t believe a single thing you wrote there since I’ve seen similar posts before. Quote from: Ashlii on November 18, 2023, 09:20:02 AM~~~but one day I will come back with a new topic about humanity, then I will help the real needy people as much as I can. Nothing and no one is higher than GodYou really don’t have to come to the forum and prove to anyone her or do anything to protect yourself, if God bless you and you become financially stable you can do your charity work off the forum, you don’t have to do it here in the forum I’m sure there are a lot of people that lives in your community that would need it more than forum members.

comments.author: Ashlii
comments.body: My dear friend, I didn't come here to say something so that you and others would compare this with the past. I don't care if you believe my words or not. I wanted to share my heart with other people beyond the borders of countries. Maybe I expressed my meaning wrongly. Dear friend, 10 people send messages every day. Congratulations, you have won 5 ethereum or something like this. You have to deposit $20 to receive a gift. Totally scam messages. But I just wanted to talk to you, thank you for making me sorry

comments.author: btc78
comments.body: there’s a lot of people in the forum who have been here for so long and have been interested in cryptocurrency maybe even longer in short they are busy people so seeing your posts might make them think that this is not the best platform for you to share this hence the harsh tonesone thing i try my best to never do is judge those who are less privileged or poor because i know a lot of them work hard it’s just that their situations don’t align with what they are given but they still try their best to make ends meet i hope you don’t take the replies from this forum too personally and instead learn more about cryptocurrency or bitcoin specifically using this platform

comments.author: krishnaverma
comments.body: Quote from: Ashlii on November 18, 2023, 09:20:02 AMHello again, thank you for reacting to the message I left, maybe the pressure of hardships and life was so much that I only asked for your help to escape from it, friends who attacked me with a harsh tone, you are right. I'm a fool for making such a big request from people who don't know me, my friend, I hope everyone here will one day be rich enough to stop judging others, most of you don't even have half of my bitcoin because you don't have the mentality, but friends who They answered me respectfully, I apologize, it's true that everyone has problems, but I'm drowning and trying to breathe, I'm not a beggar, I work hard, but you're right, this is not a charity.It doesn't matter if I am active in the forum or not, but one day I will come back with a new topic about humanity, then I will help the real needy people as much as I can. Nothing and no one is higher than GodThis section is for making posts related to Bitcoin not humanity related posts.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: I understand your discomfort, but on the Internet, since people do not know anything about you, it is natural to assume bad intentions, especially since it is your first post and the first post you asked for help. You must have a thick skin when you interact on the forums, otherwise it is better to focus on real life.What skills can you do? Teaching me fishing is better than giving you a fish. Developing your skills and asking others to help you find a job may give your life a push forward. If you develop your posts, you may join signature campaigns one day.

comments.author: Mr. Magkaisa
comments.body: Quote from: Ashlii on November 18, 2023, 09:20:02 AMHello again, thank you for reacting to the message I left, maybe the pressure of hardships and life was so much that I only asked for your help to escape from it, friends who attacked me with a harsh tone, you are right. I'm a fool for making such a big request from people who don't know me, my friend, I hope everyone here will one day be rich enough to stop judging others, most of you don't even have half of my bitcoin because you don't have the mentality, but friends who They answered me respectfully, I apologize, it's true that everyone has problems, but I'm drowning and trying to breathe, I'm not a beggar, I work hard, but you're right, this is not a charity.It doesn't matter if I am active in the forum or not, but one day I will come back with a new topic about humanity, then I will help the real needy people as much as I can. Nothing and no one is higher than God       -   In the first place, you don't really have anything to prove to the community here on the forum. I hope you can help a lot of other people in the future. Now, regarding the Bitcoin that we are talking about here, people's lives can really be changed with Bitcoin, but it depends on the dedication of a person entering this type of business industry.Because if you don't have the passion to learn and believe in Bitcoin, it won't change your life or that of anyone who tries it for real.

comments.author: Solosanz
comments.body: Alright now you admit if you're rich, then what?Do you think people will beg you for money? some may do, but I wouldn't as this forum has a rule to forbid from begging. Quote from: hugeblack on November 18, 2023, 12:14:33 PMWhat skills can you do? Teaching me fishing is better than giving you a fish. Developing your skills and asking others to help you find a job may give your life a push forward. If you develop your posts, you may join signature campaigns one day.He doesn't lack of money as he said we don't even have half of his total coins, no need for him to join a signature campaign where it's not worth for him.Quote from: Ashlii on November 18, 2023, 09:20:02 AMmost of you don't even have half of my bitcoin because you don't have the mentality
